statements: SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Maintenance';
SELECT system_name, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE system_name = 'HVAC System' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT technician_name, labor_hours FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE labor_hours > 5 AND maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_name, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_id = 'd72bb0dc-4447-4ccc-b06f-1feb2a6c3ff4';
SELECT AVG(labor_hours) AS avg_labor_hours FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE system_name = 'Electrical System';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE system_name = 'HVAC' AND maintenance_type = 'Routine' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, technician_name, labor_hours FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_type = 'Emergency' ORDER BY system_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT system_name, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE labor_hours > 5;
SELECT technician_name, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE labor_hours < 3.5 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT system_name, technician_name, labor_hours FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT building_name, system_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE building_name = 'Office Building A';
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT technician_name, work_description FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenance';
SELECT record_id, maintenance_type, technician_name FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY record_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE building_name='Main Building'
SELECT schedule_id, system_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date='2022-08-15'
SELECT maintenance_type, technician_name FROM maintenance_records WHERE schedule_id=101
SELECT building_name, system_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT record_id, work_description FROM maintenance_records WHERE technician_name='John Doe'
SELECT id, maintenance_date, description, system_id FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT system_id, system_name, building_id, system_type FROM building_system ORDER BY system_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_record WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT system_name, system_type FROM building_system WHERE building_id = 123;
SELECT record_id, technician_id, status, completion_date FROM maintenance_record ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE system_id = 2 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT maintenance_schedule.id, system_name, description, status FROM maintenance_schedule INNER JOIN building_system ON maintenance_schedule.system_id = building_system.system_id INNER JOIN maintenance_record ON maintenance_record.maintenance_id = maintenance_schedule.id WHERE system_type = 'HVAC' AND completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT building_id, COUNT(id) AS total_maintenance FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY building_id HAVING total_maintenance > 3;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND description LIKE '%inspection%' ORDER BY system_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(completion_date, maintenance_date)) AS avg_days_to_complete FROM maintenance_record WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM BuildingSystems;
SELECT building_system_id, system_name FROM BuildingSystems WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_name, maintenance_frequency FROM BuildingSystems ORDER BY maintenance_frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT building_system_id, scheduled_maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE scheduled_maintenance_date < '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM BuildingSystems;
SELECT system_name, installation_date FROM BuildingSystems WHERE maintenance_frequency > 5;

SELECT b.system_name, s.scheduled_maintenance_date, r.technician_name FROM BuildingSystems b JOIN MaintenanceSchedules s ON b.building_system_id = s.building_system_id JOIN MaintenanceRecords r ON s.schedule_id = r.schedule_id WHERE b.installation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT e.employee_name, e.department, s.maintenance_description FROM Employees e JOIN MaintenanceSchedules s ON e.employee_id = s.building_system_id;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT system_name, manufacturer FROM system ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT description FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE system_id = 1;
SELECT building_name, location FROM building WHERE usage_type = 'Commercial';
SELECT system_id, status, last_checked FROM system_status;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, schedule_id ASC;
SELECT system_id, system_name, manufacturer FROM system WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_type, completion_date FROM maintenance_records WHERE technician_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT building_id, building_name, location, usage_type FROM building WHERE usage_type = 'Office' ORDER BY building_name;
SELECT system_id, status, last_checked FROM system_status WHERE status IN ('Active', 'Under Maintenance') ORDER BY last_checked DESC, system_id;
